Node.definition: literally: to go down on (one's) knees; hence: = action by which humans kneel down in order to show respect
= deity; ► worshiped by people of Babel (בָּבֶל)
= action by which humans bow down low or bend their body forward as a mark of respect to others, often in an act of worship
= deity; ◄ of Babylon (בָּבֶל)
= a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing; ► functioning as an object of non sanctioned worship
possibly shortened form of נֶפֶשׁ חַיָּה living creature: = animal; ◄ generic, sometimes referring to all animals, sometimes limited to wild land animals only
= general term for any animal that has been domesticated; ≈ considered part of someone's wealth
= objects that are carried around by humans
= action by which humans bow down low or bend their body forward as a mark of respect to others, often in an act of worship
literally: to go down on (one's) knees; hence: = action by which humans kneel down in order to show respect
= state in which multiple events are connected

mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= state in which people, animals or objects have been forcibly carried off; ► in the case of people, into slavery or exile
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= front part of the human trunk below the ribs, containing the stomach, bowels, and reproductive organs; ≈ associated with birth, food, speech, and the innermost part of objects

Node.gloss: to care for|to assist|to help|to support
Node.definition: literally: to hold, carry; hence: = action by which humans provide help and support to other humans

= part of the lower body of women and mammals where offspring are conceived and in which they grow until their birth; ≈ sometimes extended to refer to a woman, the time of birth, the place where something is produced, and the innermost part of an area
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= state in which a human being is nearing the end of a long life; ≈ and is not able to perform certain functions
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

Node.gloss: to care for|to assist|to help|to support
Node.definition: literally: to hold, carry; hence: = action by which humans provide help and support to other humans
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= action by which humans measure the similarity or dissimilarity between two entities

Node.gloss: to be like|to be comparable to|to resemble
Node.definition: = process by which the similarity or dissimilarity between two entities is measured
= action by which someone takes an object from a container
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= receptacle, ◄ made of leather or cloth, ► used to carry possessions, including money
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= contraption consisting of rod held by a cord in the middle and with pans attached to both ends; ► used for weighing objects
= causative action by which humans obtain the service of other humans for a limited amount of time and in return for payment
= someone whose profession it is to work with precious metals, such as gold and silver
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect
= causative action by which humans or forces take hold of objects and cause them to rise up from a certain location
= the joint between each arm and the main part of the human body; ► often used for carrying heavy weights
= process by which an object moves away from its location

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= a process by which humans go through extremely difficult circumstances, resulting in severe anxiety, ◄ as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind
meaning unsure; possibly: = to show courage|meaning unsure; possibly: = to experience grief
= action by which a person or group challenges or defies an authority or agreement

Node.gloss: to take to heart|to keep in mind|to call to mind
Node.definition: literally: to bring (a matter) back to (one's) heart; hence: = action by which humans store information in their minds and continue to reflect on it
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= state of non existence of a person, place or event
= point in time at which an event starts happening
= pertaining to being the last part of an event, close to its moment of completion
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= state in which humans feel emotionally attached to a particular event

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
literally: to cry out; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities let (other) humans know that they are to come, either by approaching them directly or sending a message
literally: the rising (of the sun): = a cardinal direction indicating the direction of the rising sun
= class of larger birds of prey; ≈ associated with aggression and death

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it
= causative action by which deities conceive events in their minds, ◄ described as an artisan shaping clay into an artifact

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
literally: mighty of heart; hence: = person who is determined to pursue his/her goals, ≈ which can be a sign of bravery but also of stubbornness
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
literally: to bring near; hence: = causative process by which deities bring about a certain condition

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue of humans in need

Node.gloss: to be delayed|to linger|to be slow|to tarry
Node.definition: = to happen later than expected
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue of humans in need

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
